page.title: 20THE WRITERS NEWTON ST.CYRES
page.content: All the children from Class 1 at NEWTON ST.CYRES COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL helped to compile the information on this disk and thoroughly enjoyed the interviews, visits around the block and delivery and analysis of the questionnaires. They are: { JULIET PERRY,MARY BROWNE,CARRIE {BEALE,SARAH COBLEY,SALLY_ANNE COBLEY, {MELANIE COLES,JENNIFER COBLEY, SARAH {JOHNSON,JAMES ESCOTT,TERRY CLARK, {DARREN TREMLETT,TOM HAWKSLEY. {HEADMASTER/CLASS TEACHER JOHN MARSHALL We hope that those items omitted e.g. the Rivers Creedy and Yeo, the Police and the sewage problems of Newton and Hookway do not detract.{The sewage {embargo preventing new building means {that young families leave the villages {and affect the numbers on the School {roll which is now only 45.
